price: គេប្រាកដជាស្ថិតនៅក្នុងពោះត្រីដ៏ធំនោះ រហូតដល់ថ្ងៃ ដែលគេធ្វើឱ្យរស់ចេញពីផ្នូរឡើងវិញ(ថ្ងៃបរលោក)។
arabic: لَلَبِثَ فِي بَطۡنِهِۦٓ إِلَىٰ يَوۡمِ يُبۡعَثُونَ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: lalabitha fī baṭnihi ilā yawmi yub'ʿathūna
